items.summary: Add new product entries to the backend products array in backend/main.mo for hoodies with realistic names, prices ($80-$150 range), and descriptions fitting the HIZE premium minimalist aesthetic
Add new product entries to the backend products array in backend/main.mo for shorts with realistic names, prices ($65-$95 range), and descriptions fitting the HIZE premium minimalist aesthetic
Add new product entries to the backend products array in backend/main.mo for sunglasses with realistic names, prices ($120-$180 range), and descriptions fitting the HIZE premium minimalist aesthetic
Add new product entries to the backend products array in backend/main.mo for caps with realistic names, prices ($35-$55 range), and descriptions fitting the HIZE premium minimalist aesthetic

Add at least 3 additional diverse product entries to the backend products array in backend/main.mo such as jackets, sweaters, scarves, or bags with realistic names, appropriate pricing, and descriptions fitting the HIZE premium minimalist aesthetic

Update frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx to add image URL mappings for all newly added products (hoodies, shorts, sunglasses, caps, and additional items) using the existing imageMap pattern with placeholder image URLs
